item.title: You say it’s your birthday
item.description:
20190603-You say it’s your birthday
下载此壁纸（1920x1080）

This baby harbor seal is happily ensconced on a beach on the German island of Düne in the North Sea. Throngs of seal watchers come here each May and June to watch these cute pups spend their first few weeks of life lolling about the beach before they lean to swim.
